name: Play 2 Survive
description:
[A note on performance : Make sure you choose an appropriate quality setting before launching the game as it will have a major effect on how the game preforms, due to the time constraints full optimisations were not made :) P.S Hope you enjoy ]

- Play as Bob a business man who is clearly late for his meeting but he's stuck in the middle of the forest and these pesky zombies have stolen all the parts of his car when he crashed. Help Bob get to his meeting on time by getting back these parts from the zombies by using a combination of stealth, cards and head on offense! This game will blow you away. But beware, some zombies that have taken your parts are much much stronger and it will take a lot more stealth to take back the parts, so you have to play this strategically... Try your luck ;)

How to play? :

 - You start on top of a small cliff overlooking your broken down car where you have escaped to avoid the zombies
- You can go anywhere in the map using the WASD or Arrow Keys
- By aiming your mouse at a region of ground the player will look there
- Clicking will allow you to shoot your gun
- In order to win
     - Kill the enemies with the red light
     - Pickup the part that they drop using 'E'      - Run back to your car and press 'E' to put the part inside the car
- If you run inside the white FOV lines then the zombie will chase you (unless you have cover)
- If you shoot a zombie it will chase you as well
- The zombies with the parts are harder to kill and have much higher attack damage and move speed so bewareee!!

IMPORTANT :

- There are little cards you can collect by pressing E when near it
- Click on your 'My Cards' menu to open up your cards
- Select a card to activate the power up

Game Features : - Free Movement in a Small World with Very Nice Models - Ability to directly kill the zombies using a tiny laser gun (harder)
- Timer System to see how quick you can win
